title: Frog Is Hungry
description: A boy takes his pet frog outside. Frog decides he is hungry. He tries several things before he finds the right kind of frog food. Supportive pictures and high-frequency words make this humorous book perfect for emerging readers.
meta: buzz, crunch, eats, fly, food, frog, hop, hungry, munch
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant sound /f/
Onomatopoeia : Recognize and understand the use of onomatopoeia in text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
